subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Francesco Totti, 38, became the oldest scorer in the 22 years of the Champions League by netting a deft equalizer for Roma in a 1-1 draw at Manchester City.
snippet: Francesco Totti, 38, became the oldest scorer in the 22 years of the Champions League by netting a deft equalizer for Roma in a 1-1 draw at Manchester City.
